text: A.C. Ponte San Pietro Isola S.S.D. is a football club which plays in Italy. == Name == * 1910-1926 SS Vita Nova * 1926-1943 SS Pro Ponte * 1943-1950 SS Vita Nova * 1950-2007 US Ponte San Pietro * 2007-present US Sportiva Ponte San Pietro Isola Category:Italian football clubs Category:1910 establishments in Italy Category:Province of Bergamo
title: A.C. Ponte San Pietro
